subject: Order #SSN3903
description_text:
Dear Sir/Madam, I'm having the following problem with the box. Everything
was working fine yesterday. Today, when I turned on my PC, it suddenly told
me I was in the flash menu. So I unplugged the USB, pressed the button,
plugged the USB back in, and it still said it was in flasher mode. I
unplugged it for two minutes and restarted my PC. I've tried everything,
but it just won't work with this box anymore! What can we do?

Order#SSN3903

mfg

conversations.body_text: 你好，Philipp Bachmann，  如果您使用的是 ProX Ultra 脚踏板，请按下并松开控制盒上的 升级按钮，然后重新连接 USB 线。脚踏板将进入工作模式。
